title: Raw Garden - Kr.Barona Iela
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Fusion, Taiwanese
description: Its 3rd outlet, est. December 2015. Menu is approximately 50% raw vegan food and 50% cooked vegan food. The only non-vegan item is honey which is used at times and is also for sale. Has fresh juices, smoothies, and wheatgrass shots, along with desserts, cakes and sweets.
